name: claude-max-proxy
description: Proxy Anthropic API using your Claude Max/Pro subscription OAuth tokens

secrets.name: CLAUDE_ACCESS_TOKEN
secrets.description: OAuth access token from Claude login (run: node scripts/oauth-login.js)

secrets.name: CLAUDE_REFRESH_TOKEN
secrets.description: OAuth refresh token from Claude login

secrets.name: PROXY_SECRET
secrets.description: Your secret key to authenticate requests to this proxy
